tool_description: Get stocks / market quotes and trends, ETF, international exchanges / forex, crypto,  related news and analytics in real-time.
title: Real-Time Finance Data

api_list.name: Stock Quote
api_list.description: Get stock market quote. Supports all stock types: *stock*, *index*, *mutual fund* and *futures*.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol / ticker.

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`^DJI`*
**e.g.** *`VTSAX`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Currency News
api_list.description: Get the latest news related to a specific currency / forex or crypto.

required_parameters.name: from_symbol
required_parameters.description: A 3-Letter currency code / symbol (ISO 4217). For example: *USD*.

required_parameters.name: to_symbol
required_parameters.description: A 3-Letter currency code / symbol (ISO 4217). For example: *EUR*.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Currency Exchange Rate
api_list.description: Get currency / forex or crypto exchange rates.

required_parameters.name: from_symbol
required_parameters.description: A 3-Letter currency code / symbol (ISO 4217) to convert. For example: *USD*.

required_parameters.name: to_symbol
required_parameters.description: A 3-Letter currency code / symbol (ISO 4217) to convert to. For example: *EUR*.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Currency Time Series
api_list.description: Get forex time series for the following periods: **1 day**, **5 days**, **1 month**, **6 months**, **year-to-date**, **1 year**, **5 years** and **all times (max)**.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
Period for which to return time series.

**Periods:**
- **1D** - 1 day.
- **5D** - 5 days.
- **1M** - 1 month.
- **6M** - 6 months.
- **YTD** - year-to-date.
- **1Y** - 1 year.
- **5Y** - 5 years.
- **MAX** - all times.

required_parameters.name: to_symbol
required_parameters.description: A 3-Letter currency code / symbol (ISO 4217). For example: *EUR*.

required_parameters.name: from_symbol
required_parameters.description: A 3-Letter currency code / symbol (ISO 4217). For example: *USD*.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Stock / Company Overview
api_list.description: Get stock / public company details. Supports all stock types: *stock*, *index*, *mutual fund* and *futures*. Returns company details for the *stock* type.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol (ticker).

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`^DJI`*
**e.g.** *`VTSAX`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Company Cash Flow
api_list.description: Get public company's **quarterly** or **annual** cash flow information. Supports the *stock* type only.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
Period for which to get company's cash flow.

**Periods**: *QUARTERLY*, *ANNUAL*.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol (ticker).

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`AAPL`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Company Balance Sheet
api_list.description: Get public company's **quarterly** or **annual** balance sheet. Supports the *stock* type only.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
Period for which to get company's balance sheet.

**Periods**: *QUARTERLY*, *ANNUAL*.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol (ticker).

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`AAPL`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Company Income Statement
api_list.description: Get public company's **quarterly** or **annual** income statement. Supports the *stock* type only.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol (ticker).

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`AAPL`*

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
Period for which to get company's income statement.

**Periods**: *QUARTERLY*, *ANNUAL*.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Stock News
api_list.description: Get the latest news related to a specific stock.  Supports all stock types: *stock*, *index*, *mutual fund* and *futures*.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol / ticker.

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`^DJI`*
**e.g.** *`VTSAX`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Stock Time Series
api_list.description: Get stock time series and key news events for the following periods: **1 day**, **5 days**, **1 month**, **6 months**, **year-to-date**, **1 year**, **5 years** and **all times (max)**. In addition, the endpoints returns the key news events that affected the stock prices  in the specified period. Supports all stock types: *stock*, *index*, *mutual fund* and *futures*.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
Period for which to return time series and key events.

**Periods:**
- **1D** - 1 day.
- **5D** - 5 days.
- **1M** - 1 month.
- **6M** - 6 months.
- **YTD** - year-to-date.
- **1Y** - 1 year.
- **5Y** - 5 years.
- **MAX** - all times.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
Stock symbol (ticker).

**e.g.** *`MSFT:NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`MSFT`*
**e.g.** *`^DJI`*
**e.g.** *`VTSAX`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Find stocks, indices, mutual funds, futures, currency / forex / crypto using a free-form query or symbol as seen on Google Finance - https://www.google.com/finance.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Free-form search query.

**e.g.** *`AAPL`*
**e.g.** *`Microsoft NASDAQ`*
**e.g.** *`Dow Johns`*
**e.g.** *`USD to EUR`*

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.

api_list.name: Market Trends
api_list.description: Get the latest market trends and relevant news. Supported trends: **Most Active**, **Gainers**, **Losers**, **Crypto**, **Currencies** and **Climate Leaders**.

required_parameters.name: trend_type
required_parameters.description:
Trend type.

**Supported trend types:**

- *MARKET_INDEXES*
- *MOST_ACTIVE*
- *GAINERS*
- *LOSERS*
- *CRYPTO*
- *CURRENCIES*
- *CLIMATE_LEADERS*

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
The country for which to get trends, specified as a 2-letter country code - see [ISO 3166](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes).

**Default**: *us*.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.
